title: Family-Friendly Orlando Escape with Nightly Drinks, Included Resort Fees & Walt Disney World® Resort Shuttle
description:
Adventure and magic await at this family-friendly _Walt Disney World Good Neighbor_® Meliá stay, located just minutes from the world-famous _Walt Disney World®_.

With packages for up to six guests and a prime position in Celebration, Florida - with palm-lined streets, charming boutiques and inviting restaurants all laid out according to The Walt Disney Company's original specifications - you'll be perfectly placed to get among the action, with complimentary shuttles to _Walt Disney World®, Universal Orlando™_, _SeaWorld Orlando™_ and more.

When you're not exploring the parks, spend time lazing by the resort's lagoon-style heated pool, sink into bliss at the nearby AdventHealth Celebration spa (access included), build an appetite up at the onsite soccer pitch and volleyball court or feast on coastal cuisine at The Wilson.
offer_address: 225 Celebration Place, Celebration, Florida 34747, United States

vendor_name: The Ritz-Carlton Residences Orlando, Grande Lakes
title: Three- & Four-Bedroom Orlando Homes with US$200 Daily Resort Credit & Walt Disney World® Resort Shuttle
description:
Experience the pinnacle of Florida luxury at a five-star residence in Orlando’s Grande Lakes. A short distance from Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Studios, this premier retreat spans 500 acres of pristine landscapes. Indulge in championship golf, a world-class spa and exquisite cuisine at 13 venues, from farm-to-table dining to sensational seafood at acclaimed Knife & Spoon.

Lounge by sun-drenched pools with private cabanas or seek adventure at the Waterpark with three water slides, a lazy river, Aquaventure playground and kids' Splash Cove. Enjoy exclusive three- and four-bedroom residences with private pools, full kitchens and outdoor dining spaces. Whether seeking tranquillity or adventure, this Grande Lakes retreat offers luxury, privacy and unforgettable experiences.
location_description: The Ritz-Carlton Residences Orlando, Grande Lakes
offer_address: 4012 Central Florida Parkway, Orlando, Florida 32837, United States

title: Stylish Orlando Resort Stay near Theme Parks with Award-Winning Golf Course
description: Discover luxurious comforts at Orlando’s largest resort, Rosen Shingle Creek Hotel. A short drive from the area’s iconic theme parks, the resort has plenty of enticing attractions to keep the family entertained - from the 18-hole championship golf course to four heated pools. There’s something for every taste with 11 restaurants offering a variety of cuisines. If total relaxation is in order, the resort also boasts a day spa with an indulgent treatment list from signature facials to massages.
offer_address: 9939 Universal Boulevard, Orlando, Florida 32819, United States

title: Contemporary Downtown Orlando Escape 15 Minutes from Universal Orlando Resort
description: Embrace the vibrant pulse of Florida with a stay at Crowne Plaza Orlando-Downtown, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned to explore the best of downtown, this stylish retreat is just a short drive to Universal Orlando Resort - making it perfect for family adventures. Sports enthusiasts will relish the hotel's proximity to Kia Center, Exploria Stadium and Camping World Stadium. After a day of adventure, unwind by the serene outdoor pool, or indulge on culinary delights at the hotel's onsite bistro.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Orlando-Downtown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 304 W Colonial Drive, Orlando, Florida 32801, USA

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Orlando - Lake Buena Vista
title: Family-Friendly Orlando Stay near Walt Disney World® with Complimentary Theme Park Shuttle & Waterfall Pool
description: Treat the whole family to the escape of their dreams with a stay at Crowne Plaza Orlando - Lake Buena Vista, an IHG Hotel. Create lasting memories with day trips to Orlando’s best theme parks, including Walt Disney World®, made easier with a complimentary daily shuttle service. After a day of sunshine and laughter, return to the comfort of this hotel to enjoy a splash in the outdoor pool, featuring an enchanting waterfall, and enjoy a juicy steak at H Street Grille & Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Orlando - Lake Buena Vista, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 8686 Palm Parkway, Orlando, FL 32836, United States
